articles.title: Why is junking Microsoft Windows 10 a huge sustainability issue? - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: As Microsoft looks to end support for Windows 10 in 2025, PCs that are incompatible with Windows 11 could end up as junk in landfills.
articles.content:
• The end of Microsoft Windows 10 support could turn 240 million PCs into e-waste.
